entry.name: SpaceMarines/VenerableDreadnoughtDescription
entry.value: Venerable Dreadnought hero with extreme durability and supporting skills.

entry.name: SpaceMarines/VenerableDreadnoughtFlavor
entry.value: A Venerable Dreadnought is a variant of the standard Imperial Castraferrum Pattern Dreadnought combat walker used by the Chapters of the Adeptus Astartes whose occupant is regarded as one of the oldest and wisest Space Marines still in service to the Imperium of Man.
